New TikTok™ Theme Maker! Create your own Live Wallpapers & Themes from your favorite TikToks™. To use the TikTok™ maker, simply download your favorite TikTok™ video clip as live wallpaper and use the built in “Maker” to trim, select key photo, keyboard background and save to add to your live wallpaper library. 

We’ve also added new Live Calendar Lock-Screen Wallpapers, professionally designed Sticker Collections and over 150 Fonts for your social posts and chats, plus GIPHY™ integration for easy access to your favorite GIFs. Dark-Mode layout updated for iOS14 and Optimized for iPhone 11/12 11/12Pro/11/12Pro Max/XS/XS Max. Includes additional bug fixes, improved stability & performance for iOS 14.4

New TikTok™ Theme Maker! Create your own Live Wallpapers & Themes from your favorite TikToks™. To use the TikTok™ maker, simply download your favorite TikTok™ video clip as live wallpaper and use the built in “Maker” to trim, select key photo, keyboard background and save to add to your live wallpaper library. 

We’ve also added new Live Calendar Lock-Screen Wallpapers, professionally designed Sticker Collections and over 150 Fonts for your social posts and chats, plus GIPHY™ integration for easy access to your favorite GIFs. Dark-Mode layout updated for iOS14 and Optimized for iPhone 11/12 11/12Pro/11/12Pro Max/XS/XS Max. Includes additional bug fixes, improved stability & performance for iOS 14.4

New TikTok™ Theme Maker! Create your own Live Wallpapers & Themes from your favorite TikToks™. To use the TikTok™ maker, simply download your favorite TikTok™ video clip as live wallpaper and use the built in “Maker” to trim, select key photo, keyboard background and save to add to your live wallpaper library. 

We’ve also added new Live Calendar Lock-Screen Wallpapers, professionally designed Sticker Collections and over 150 Fonts for your social posts and chats, plus GIPHY™ integration for easy access to your favorite GIFs.
